transcription: There's an old saying in real estate and that is nothing beats location. It's the one thing that you can't change about a property. And if you're into yachting like these guys behind me, just about nothing is going to beat the location of 47 Australia Court at Newport.  end of the cul-de-sac. Being just a few doors away from the main channel and also being in the very first canal in the entire development, this gives you almost instantaneous access to the bay, the blue water and beyond. This home is architect designed and constructed in the early 1980s. It's western red cedar lined and it's got a really  really warm Scandinavian feel with open spaces that draw in the breezes right the way through the house. That Nordley aspect, outdoor entertaining, it just doesn't get any better. I can't stress this highly enough, the opportunity to purchase so close to the  entrance of Moreton Bay is almost a one-off opportunity. You really owe it to yourself to come through and have a look at this property so why not give me a call I'd love to take you through.
